# Docker has specific installation instructions for each operating system. # Please refer to the official documentation at https://docker.com/get-started/ # Pull the Node.js Docker image: docker pull node:24-alpine # Create a Node.js container and start a Shell session: docker run -it --rm --entrypoint sh node:24-alpine # Verify the Node.js version: node -v # Should print "v24.11.0". # Verify npm version: npm -v # Should print "11.6.1".
